title: Henning Mankell, Dean of Scandinavian Noir Writers, Dies at 67
text:
Henning Mankell, Dean of Scandinavian Noir Writers, Dies at 67 
Published By: NYTimes - Today 
The Swedish novelist and playwright gained global prominence with 10 mystery novels featuring Inspector Kurt Wallander, a gruff but humane d...
